radiographic_examinations.findings: Neurofibromatous change with elements of giant cell fibroblastoma in the left breast; right breast nipple-areola neurofibroma after 3 years.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient returned 3 years later with neurofibroma-related gynecomastia of the right breast, excised; normal texture and appearance six months postoperatively.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Direct excision of neurofibroma beneath nipple-areola complex
radiographic_examinations.findings: Bilateral breast enlargement with firm fibrous tissue, tenderness on palpation.
Firm masses localized to the nipple-areola complex bilaterally.
Bilateral gynecomastia, left breast larger than right; tissue showed hyalinized collagenous stroma without ducts.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Progression of cutaneous lesions over truncal region consistent with neurofibromatosis type I after 9 years; no evidence of recurrent gynecomastia.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Direct excision of right breast mass
radiographic_examinations.findings: Tender mass beneath the right breast, associated with neurofibromatous changes.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Direct excision of both breast masses
radiographic_examinations.findings: Diffuse cafe au lait spots and tender masses involving both breasts, with left side greater than right.
